title: C9 vs SSG - Game One
body:
Couldn't post earlier, just recovered from the temporary blindness caused by watching C9's performance earlier today.

Did anyone see that Cass 3v1 where she killed Ali for FB?

What. in. the. world(s) - HAHAHAHA

Why are the other two bitching it harder than Ali, who's being focused?

replies.body:
Yea it appeared as if there was miscommunication between rek and Ali which gave crown time to flash out. He then turned it around and got the kill.

SSG were so dominant today cuv√©e on poppy was insane his heroic charges were on point. Corejj on karma was a beast and then his tahm Kerch had some great devours. Ambition Crown and Ruler all had stand out games too. 

C9 were never really in it. To me i viewed it as the difference between a team who got themselves to the quarters verse a team who were dependant on other results going their way to get them. All in all was a result I expected
